testcase.name: keyword search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: keyword search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.001s When a search for "nutcracker, sadlers" keywords is performed ... passed in 0.071s Then a single event should be returned ... passed in 0.000s And that event should have the ID of "6IF" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: date range search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: date range search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s When a search for events with performances "30"-"37" days from now is performed ... passed in 0.064s Then the events all have a performance between "30" and "37" days from now ... passed in 1.929s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: country search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: country search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s When a search for events in country with code "jp" is performed ... passed in 0.060s Then all events are in country with code "jp" ... passed in 0.008s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: city search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: city search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s When a search for events in city with code "paris-fr" is performed ... passed in 0.069s Then all events are in city with code "paris-fr" ... passed in 0.009s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: geo search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: geo search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s When a search for events within "100"km of "35.5000" lat and "139.300" long is performed ... passed in 0.068s Then the events are all within "100"km of "35.5000" lat and "139.300" long ... passed in 0.008s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: paginated search
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: paginated search Given an API client with valid credentials ... passed in 0.000s When a search is performed for page 2 with a page length of 3 is performed ... passed in 0.013s Then the 7, 8 and 9th events are returned ... passed in 0.011s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
